title: ponnaDi unadinai
sahitya:
ponnaDi unadinai paNindiDa vandEn cenni malai mevum subrahmaNyA nAn


anupallavi

  innalE urAmal irundu vandiDa unnaruLaip-peTru inbam uTriDa


caraNam    tannighar illAda dayavODu anbarin tunbam ellAm tuDaikkum ayyanE 
enniDam adupOl un idayam kaniya panmurai paNindu bhaktiyuDan nAn
